body.headline: Scribble your life!
body.description:
Scribbles is a simple tool to convert almost any image into a fairly good hand-drawn sketchy looking artstyle.
It makes use of a handful of convolutionary image processing algorithms, most notably sobel edge detection, which compares nearby pixel values and reacts to brightness-deltas instead of absolute values.
